means: 特里（姓氏，男子名， Terence 的昵称）

sentence.Network_en: Off-screen, Kathy is under the watchful eye of her father Terry.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活中的凯茜受到父亲特里的严格看管。

sentence.Network_en: When I look over and see Terry I tingle all over.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我放眼望去见到特里时，我整个人兴奋不已。

sentence.Network_en: Terry actually says "Oh, shucks!" when complimented on her singing.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们赞誉她的歌声时，特里实际上会说“噢，没什么!”

entry.tran: （尤用于制作毛巾、婴儿尿布等的）毛圈棉织物，毛巾布
entry.def: Terry or terry cloth is a type of fabric which has a lot of very small loops covering both sides. It is used especially for making things like towels and babies' nappies.

means.word_mean: 1. a pile fabric (usually cotton) with uncut loops on both sides; used to make bath towels and bath robes
